flavorText: Its skin remains in a flowing, liquid state that keeps its body coated with potent restorative lymph.

foreignData.flavorText: Seine Haut behält immer einen flüssigen Zustand, der dafür sorgt, dass der Körper mit heilender Lymphe bedeckt ist.
foreignData.name: Lymphremasuri
foreignData.text: Alle Remasuri-Kreaturen haben Absorbieren 1. (Falls eine Quelle einem Remasuri Schaden zufügen würde, verhindere 1 dieser Schadenspunkte.)

foreignData.flavorText: Su piel permanece en un estado líquido fluyente que mantiene su cuerpo recubierto con una potente linfa restauradora.
foreignData.name: Fragmentado de la linfa
foreignData.text: Todas las criaturas Fragmentado tienen la habilidad de absorber 1. (Si una fuente fuera a hacerle daño a un Fragmentado, prevén 1 punto de ese daño.)

foreignData.flavorText: Sa peau reste à l'état liquide, enveloppant son corps d'une puissante gangue de lymphe reconstituante.
foreignData.name: Slivoïde lymphatique
foreignData.text: Toutes les créatures Slivoïde ont absorption 1. (Si une source devait infliger des blessures à un slivoïde, prévenez 1 de ces blessures.)

foreignData.flavorText: La sua pelle rimane in un fluido stato liquido che ne mantiene il corpo ricoperto da una potente linfa ristoratrice.
foreignData.name: Tramutante Linfatico
foreignData.text: Tutte le creature Tramutante hanno assorbire 1. (Se una fonte sta per infliggere danno a un Tramutante, previeni 1 di quei danni.)

foreignData.flavorText: その皮膚は流れる液状のままで、胴体を回復の効き目のあるリンパ液で覆っている。
foreignData.name: 血清スリヴァー
foreignData.text: スリヴァー・クリーチャーは吸収１を持つ。（発生源１つがスリヴァーにダメージを与えるなら、そのダメージを１点軽減する。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スリヴァー

foreignData.flavorText: Sua pele permanece num estado líquido, fluente, que mantém o corpo coberto por uma potente linfa regeneradora.
foreignData.name: Fractius Linfático
foreignData.text: Todas as criaturas do tipo Fractius têm absorver 1. (Se uma fonte for causar dano a um Fractius, previna 1 ponto daquele dano.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ее кожа остается в текучей, жидкой форме, покрывая тело сильной восстановительной лимфой.
foreignData.name: Лимфатическая Щепка
foreignData.text: Все существа-Щепки имеют Поглощение 1. (Если источник должен нанести повреждения Щепке, предотвратите 1 из тех повреждений.)

foreignData.flavorText: 其皮肤始终保持流质状态，使身体随时覆盖着具强力疗效的淋巴液。
foreignData.name: 淋巴裂片妖
foreignData.text: 所有裂片妖生物具有抵受1。（如果某来源将对任一裂片妖造成伤害，则防止该伤害中的1点。）

foreignData.flavorText: 其皮膚始終保持流質狀態，使身體隨時覆蓋著具強力療效的淋巴液。
foreignData.name: 淋巴裂片妖
foreignData.text: 所有裂片妖生物具有抵受1。（如果某來源將對任一裂片妖造成傷害，則防止該傷害中的1點。）

name: Lymph Sliver
originalText: All Sliver creatures have absorb 1. (If a source would deal damage to a Sliver, prevent 1 of that damage.)

rulings.text: Abilities that Slivers grant, as well as power/toughness boosts, are cumulative. However, for some abilities, like flying, having more than one instance of the ability doesn’t provide any additional benefit.
If the creature type of a Sliver changes so it’s no longer a Sliver, it will no longer be affected by its own ability. Its ability will continue to affect other Sliver creatures.
If multiple sources would deal damage to a Sliver at once, prevent 1 damage from each of those sources.
If multiple replacement effects apply to a creature being dealt damage, the controller of the creature chooses the order to apply them, not the controller of the source of damage.

text: All Sliver creatures have absorb 1. (If a source would deal damage to a Sliver, prevent 1 of that damage.)
